api_list.api_description: Query GP data using special datasets.

template_response.description: Responds with requested data in the specified format.

api_list.api_description: Get facts for multiple numbers in one request.

optional_parameters.name: numbers
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of numbers or number ranges.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Return the facts in JSON format.

template_response.1: 1 is the number of dimensions of a line.
template_response.2: 2 is the number of polynucleotide strands in a DNA double helix.
template_response.3: 3 is the number of sets needed to be won to win the whole match in volleyball.

query: I am interested in the special dataset my team wants. Can you also provide me with facts about my 3 favorite numbers?
